narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Affordable Health Care Services LLC is a Clinic/Center  Developmental Disabilities provider based in Washington, DC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $25.9M in Medicaid payments across 249K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $25.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
